name: Path of Theodorus
description:
Controls:
  • movement: w,a,s,d or up, left, down, right
  • restart: r or spacebar

Backstory for this game can be found over here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spiral_of_Theodorus

Developed for the call sqrt sixteen times per frame jam. I use my sixteen sqrt calls to calculate the spiral's sixteen triangles :)

Music
  • preoccupied 1Q21 by Setuniman (https://freesound.org/people/Setuniman/)
